response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to us, but its worth to you is even greater. We understand its significance and are excited to extend this offer to you. For a limited time, we are willing to sell the product to you at a special price of $1,300,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,500,000, making it a remarkable deal for you. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1300000}
